fn.p: Edited by: Zisis Kozlakidis, International Agency For Research On Cancer (IARC), France
Reviewed by: Mahmoud Mohamed Shehata, National Research Centre, Egypt; Jean Kaoru Millet, Institut National de Recherche pour l'agriculture, l'alimentation et l'environnement (INRAE), France
This article was submitted to Pediatric Infectious Diseases, a section of the journal Frontiers in Pediatrics
